entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Contains fallback translation fails when the array parameter has AsQueryable #32218
  • Nav expansion visitor does not visit the Contains item argument (and possibly other non-lambda arguments) #32217
  • Support CRUD operations for updatable views #32216
  • QueryableMethodNormalizingExpressionVisitor does not visit recursively when converting List.Contains to Queryable.Contains #32215
  • Segmentation fault on Migrate() on s390x #32209
  • SqlNullabilityProcessor ignores Contains item visitation #32208

Closed

  • Emit warning or information log message when using `QuerySplittingBehavior.SplitQuery` unneccessarily #32213
  • Exception trying to use EF.Functions.StandardDeviationSample #32212
  • Make existing model building conventions more extensible #28866
    MQ
  • Move detection of ColumnAttribute in RelationalTypeMappingInfo to conventions #11124
    MQ
  • EF Core 7 + Oracle database = TPT inheritance doesn't work #32206
  • IndexOutOfRange thrown from In-Memory when using union on owned types #32159
  • Daily Build 23524.5 UseSQLServer LogTo method requires explicit package ref to logging #32204
  • Microsoft.Extensions dependencies in 8.0 latest nightly broken #32171
  • TIL Include() doesn't always load entities #32144
  • Explicit default in DB is not preserved in EF with HasDefaultValue #32123
  • Support arbitrary expressions in inline collections (translate to VALUES) #30734
    8.0.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Make ModelBuilderTest asserts more robust and extensible #32221
    providers-beware
  • Add more tests for ConventionSet and fix the found issues. #32220
  • Visit arguments in QueryableMethodNormalizingExpressionVisitor after converting List.Contains #32219
  • Take into account Contains item visitation in SqlNullabilityProcessor #32214

Merged

  • Allow to ignore attributes when finding type mapping #32193
  • Refactor out the baselines for CSharpRuntimeModelCodeGeneratorTest #32196
  • Update DailyBuilds to indicate build to use for EF8 #32210

Updated

  • Replace explicit richCodeNavigationEnvironment in azure-pipelines-richnav.yml #32082
